title: Yuuki Yuuna wa Yuusha de Aru: Hidamari
original_name: 結城友奈は勇者である 総集編「ひだまり」
opening_song: "Hoshi to Hana (ホシトハナ)" by Sanshuu Chuugaku Yuusha-bu (讃州中学勇者部) (Haruka Terui, Suzuko Mimori, Yumi Uchida, Tomoyo Kurosawa, Juri Nagatsuma)
sinopse: A recap episode of the original series made to connect Yuuki Yuuna wa Yuusha de Aru: Washio Sumi no Shou to the sequel series Yuuki Yuuna wa Yuusha de Aru: Yuusha no Shou.
